sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react"


export const Forgot = () => {
    return (
        <>
            <Flex w={"full"} h={"648px"} bgGradient="linear(#FFC900, #FFEA61)" justifyContent={"center"}>
                <Box mt={"120px"} bg={"white"} w={"600px"} h={"400px"} border={"2px solid"} borderColor={"black"} borderRadius={"10px"} boxShadow={"0px 0px 10px black"} justifyContent={"center"}>
                    <Flex justifyContent={"center"}>
                        <Heading mt={"50px"} color={"#D5AD18"} fontSize={"40px"} fontFamily={"Times New Roman"}>Forgot your Password?</Heading>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex mt={"15px"} fontSize={"12px"} justifyContent={"center"} >
                    <Text display={"flex"}>
                        Write your Email to reset your Password!
                    </Text>
                </Flex>
                </Box>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )
}
